participant_1.background:
I love to be active and look my best, but I can get sad when I lose a loved one.
i work as a veterinarian.
i own four german shepherds.
i like meat too much.
After quitting my job, I devoted my time to raising and selling pigs.

participant_2.background:
I've been single for a while now because I'm too focused on my career.
sometimes i wish i did not have to wake up in the morning.
My job is secure and I get paid well.
My parents were very supportive of my interests and hobbies.
I'm a safari guide who loves to read in my spare time.

content.text: Hi there. What do you do for a living?
I am a safari guide. I get to work with animals and travel the world. It's a great job!
That sounds amazing! I'm a veterinarian, but I've recently quit my job to focus on raising and selling pigs.
Wow, that's a big change! What made you decide to do that?
I just love working with animals and I'm passionate about pigs. I also wanted to be my own boss.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll do great. I wish I could be my own boss.
Thanks! I'm sure you could do it too. You just have to be brave and take a risk.
I'm not sure I'm brave enough for that. I'm too focused on my career.
I understand. It's not for everyone. But it's definitely worth considering if you're passionate about something.
Thanks for the advice. I'll keep it in mind.
No problem! Have a great day.
